Name: Senile atrophy of choroid
Definition: A female breast cancer that is located_in the upper-outer quadrant of the breast.

Name: angioid streaks of choroid
Definition: A paralytic poliomyelitis that results in destruction located in motor neurons of brainstem

Name: hereditary choroidal atrophy
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves zoonotic infection of humans by the larvae of Toxocara canis or Toxocara cati. The larvae invade multiple tissues like liver

Name: obsolete tuberculous meningitis
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves zoonotic infection of humans by the larvae of Toxocara canis or Toxocara cati. The larvae invade multiple tissues like liver

Name: diffuse secondary choroid atrophy
Definition: A hypersensitivity reaction type III disease that is characterized by inflammation and injury to blood vessels and has_symptom purpura
